name: myaihub
description: Comprehensive AI tools directory hosted on GitHub Pages and Vercel

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html styles.css script.js site.webmanifest googlef0c930498af188a5.html public/ && cp -r images public/

author: My AI Hub
